author: Conor Gallagher
title: Coronavirus testing backlog to be cleared next week, Simon Harris says
description: Minister says daily increase in cases needs to fall below 5% before lifting of restrictions considered
content:
The HSE expects to clear the backlog of coronavirus tests by next week, Minister for Health Simon Harris has said.
Mr Harris said about 7,000 samples can now be tested per day with GPs currently referring about 2,000 cases for a test daily.
About 25,000 sam… [+3222 chars]
